import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import magic from './Details.module.css' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {Tab, Tabs } from 'react-bootstrap' import germany from '../assets/deutchland.png' import greatBritain from '../assets/england.png' import italy from '../assets/italy.png' import checkmark from '../assets/checkmark.png' const Details = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [details, setdetails] = useState({}) const [key, setKey] = useState('home'); useEffect (() => { fetch(`https://www.thecocktaildb.com/api/json/v1/1/lookup.php?i=${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setdetails(data.drinks[0])) }, []) const convert = (obj) => { return Object .keys(obj) .filter(item => item.includes('strIngredient')) .map(item => obj[item]) .filter(Boolean) } return (

{details.strDrink}

Ingredients
{convert(details).map(x=> {x})}
Details
  • Category: {details.strCategory}
  • IBA: {details.strIBA}
  • Alcoholic: {details.strAlcoholic}
  • Glass: {details.strGlass}

Instructions

setKey(k)} className={`mb-3 ${magic.tabs}`} > }>

{details.strInstructionsDE}

 }>

{details.strInstructions}

 }>

{details.strInstructionsIT}

 {/* изучить */}
) } export default Details;
